result.execSummary:
The defendant JESSICA R TOLLARD was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Winnebago County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Forfeiture and costs to be paid within 60 days from sentence date, unless payment plan is approved.  Penalty for non-payment shall be entry of civil judgment.   Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees.  Send payments to:  Clerk of Courts, Room 110, 415 Jackson Street, P O Box 2808, Oshkosh WI  54903-2808.

Consecutive to any other sentence.
Granted Huber if in compliance with jail regulations.
Granted Good Time.
Within 72 hrs, report to Winnebago Cty Work Release Center (M-F/7:30 am-3:00 pm) with completed GPS application and the minute sheet in order set a report date which shall be no later than 60 days from the date of sentencing.
Consecutive to: any other sentence

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample and fingerpring to the Sheriff's office. This collection of DNA is done in Room 15 on the lower level of Courthouse between the hours of 8:30 am-4:00 pm/Monday thru Friday. Defendant shall provide proof of identification along with the court minutes stating a DNA sample is required.  Failure to comply with this order may result in either a finding of contempt of court or a criminal charge of Failure to Provide a DNA Sample pursuant to Wis. Stats. 946.52.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. JESSICA R TOLLARD
